data.title: The Patriot and the Spy
data.meta_description: The Patriot and the Spy is a 1915 American silent drama film, directed by Jack Harvey. It stars James Cruze, Marguerite Snow, and Alphonse Ethier. Prints and/or fragments were found in the Dawson Film Find in 1978.
data.text:
1915 film by Jack Harvey / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
